com.ibm.team.repository.common.query.ast
Interface ISingleQueryModel

All Superinterfaces:
IQueryModel
All Known Subinterfaces:
IBaseBuildDefinitionQueryModel.IBuildDefinitionQueryModel, IBaseBuildEngineQueryModel.IBuildEngineQueryModel, IBaseBuildResultQueryModel.IBuildResultQueryModel, IBaseCoreDescriptorQueryModel.ICoreDescriptorQueryModel, IBaseDataSetQueryModel.IDataSetQueryModel, IBaseFolderDescriptorQueryModel.IFolderDescriptorQueryModel, IBaseReportDescriptorQueryModel.IReportDescriptorQueryModel, IBaseReportQueryDescriptorQueryModel.IReportQueryDescriptorQueryModel, IBaseSharableDescriptorQueryModel.ISharableDescriptorQueryModel, IBaseStorageNodeQueryModel.IStorageNodeQueryModel, IDynamicItemQueryModel, IDynamicQueryModel, ISingleItemQueryModel
public interface ISingleQueryModel
extends IQueryModel

Defines the query model for query model roots, or single valued references to Items or Helpers. Instances can be acquired by using the root associated with an item. For example, if an Item subclasses was named Child then the root of the query model could be acquired using ChildQueryModel.ROOT.

Since:
0.5

Method Summary
 IPredicate _isMissing()
          Returns a predicate that evaluates to true if the target of reference is missing, in other words a dangling reference.
 IPredicate _isNull()
          Returns a predicate that evaluates to true when the reference is null.
 IPseudoVariable _itemType()
